name: miss
script:
if isTarget(matches[2]) then 
	if table.contains(Tragedy.hits, "hit2") then
    	table.remove(Tragedy.hits, table.index_of(Tragedy.hits, "hit2"))
    	table.insert(Tragedy.hits, "miss2")
	else
    	table.remove(Tragedy.hits, table.index_of(Tragedy.hits, "hit1"))
    	table.insert(Tragedy.hits, "miss1")
	end
end
matches: ^You stab your dirk quickly at (.+) but miss by a hair\.$
^(.+) parries the attack with a deft manoeuvre\.$
^(.+) twists (?:his|her) body out of harm's way\.$
^(.+) dodges nimbly out of the way\.$
^(.+) quickly jumps back, avoiding the attack\.$
^A reflection of (.+) blinks out of existence\.$
^(.+) moves into your attack, knocking your blow aside before viciously countering with a strike to your head\.$
^You lash out at (.+) with (.+)\, but miss.$
^A dizzying beam of energy strikes you as your attack rebounds off of (.+)\'s shield\.$
